title: Compounding Engineering Pattern

problem.en: Traditional software engineering has diminishing returns: each feature increases complexity. With AI agents, this is amplified as agents repeat the same mistakes because learnings aren't captured.
problem.ko: 전통적인 소프트웨어 엔지니어링은 수확 체감이 있습니다: 각 기능이 복잡성을 증가시킵니다. AI 에이전트에서는 학습이 캡처되지 않아 에이전트가 같은 실수를 반복하므로 이 문제가 증폭됩니다.

solution.en: Make each feature compound by codifying all learnings into reusable agent instructions: system prompts, slash commands, subagents, and hooks.
solution.ko: 모든 학습 내용을 재사용 가능한 에이전트 지침(시스템 프롬프트, 슬래시 명령, 서브에이전트, 훅)으로 코드화하여 각 기능을 복합적으로 만듭니다.

mermaid_diagram:
graph LR
    A[Build Feature] --> B[Document Learnings]
    B --> C[Codify into Prompts/Commands]
    C --> D[Next Feature Uses Knowledge]
    D --> E[Easier & Faster Build]
    E --> A
code_example:
# After completing a feature, codify learnings:

# 1. Update CLAUDE.md with patterns
with open('CLAUDE.md', 'a') as f:
    f.write('## API Error Handling\n')
    f.write('Always wrap external calls in retry logic...\n')

# 2. Create slash command for repeated workflow
# .claude/commands/test-with-validation.md
command = '''
Run tests with extra validation:
1. Run unit tests
2. Check for type errors
3. Validate API contracts
'''

# 3. Add hook to prevent regressions
# .claude/hooks/pre-commit.sh
hook = 'npm run typecheck && npm test'

# Result: Next features get this knowledge for free
